question: The fifth meeting of BRICS Ministers of Education was held in __________.
explanation: The Meeting of BRICS Ministers of Education was held in Beijing, China. The National Institutional Ranking Framework (NIRF), SWAYAM platform which has already hosted over 480 courses online, research initiative IMPRINT and Smart India Hackathon. The Indian delegation was led by Shri Prakash Javadekar, Minister of Human Resource Development, India.
